actions.name: AddLayerVersionPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to add permissions to the resource-based policy of a version of an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: AddPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to give an AWS service or another account permission to use an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: CreateAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create an alias for a Lambda function version

actions.name: CreateCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Lambda code signing config

actions.name: CreateEventSourceMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to create a mapping between an event source and an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: CreateFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: DeleteAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Lambda function alias

actions.name: DeleteCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Lambda code signing config

actions.name: DeleteEventSourceMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Lambda event source mapping

actions.name: DeleteFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: DeleteFunctionCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a code signing config from an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: DeleteFunctionConcurrency
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a concurrent execution limit from an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: DeleteFunctionEventInvokeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the configuration for asynchronous invocation for an AWS Lambda function, version, or alias

actions.name: DeleteLayerVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a version of an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: DeleteProvisionedConcurrencyConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the provisioned concurrency configuration for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: DisableReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to disable replication for a Lambda@Edge function

actions.name: EnableReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to enable replication for a Lambda@Edge function

actions.name: GetAccountSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an account's limits and usage in an AWS Region

actions.name: GetAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Lambda function alias

actions.name: GetCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Lambda code signing config

actions.name: GetEventSourceMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Lambda event source mapping

actions.name: GetFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: GetFunctionCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view the code signing config arn attached to an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: GetFunctionConcurrency
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the reserved concurrency configuration for a function

actions.name: GetFunctionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the version-specific settings of an AWS Lambda function or version

actions.name: GetFunctionEventInvokeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view the configuration for asynchronous invocation for a function, version, or alias

actions.name: GetLayerVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a version of an AWS Lambda layer. Note this action also supports GetLayerVersionByArn API

actions.name: GetLayerVersionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to view the resource-based policy for a version of an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to view the resource-based policy for an AWS Lambda function, version, or alias

actions.name: GetProvisionedConcurrencyConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view the provisioned concurrency configuration for an AWS Lambda function's alias or version

actions.name: InvokeAsync
actions.description: Grants permission to invoke a function asynchronously (Deprecated)

actions.name: InvokeFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to invoke an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: ListAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of aliases for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: ListCodeSigningConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS Lambda code signing configs

actions.name: ListEventSourceMappings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS Lambda event source mappings

actions.name: ListFunctionEventInvokeConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of configurations for asynchronous invocation for a function

actions.name: ListFunctions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS Lambda functions, with the version-specific configuration of each function

actions.name: ListFunctionsByCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS Lambda functions by the code signing config assigned

actions.name: ListLayerVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of versions of an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: ListLayers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS Lambda layers, with details about the latest version of each layer

actions.name: ListProvisionedConcurrencyConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of provisioned concurrency configurations for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: ListVersionsByFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of versions for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: PublishLayerVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: PublishVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Lambda function version

actions.name: PutFunctionCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a code signing config to an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: PutFunctionConcurrency
actions.description: Grants permission to configure reserved concurrency for an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: PutFunctionEventInvokeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to configures options for asynchronous invocation on an AWS Lambda function, version, or alias

actions.name: PutProvisionedConcurrencyConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to configure provisioned concurrency for an AWS Lambda function's alias or version

actions.name: RemoveLayerVersionPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a statement from the permissions policy for a version of an AWS Lambda layer

actions.name: RemovePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke function-use permission from an AWS service or another account

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: UpdateAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of an AWS Lambda function's alias

actions.name: UpdateCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Lambda code signing config

actions.name: UpdateEventSourceMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of an AWS Lambda event source mapping

actions.name: UpdateFunctionCode
actions.description: Grants permission to update the code of an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: UpdateFunctionCodeSigningConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the code signing config of an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: UpdateFunctionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the version-specific settings of an AWS Lambda function

actions.name: UpdateFunctionEventInvokeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration for asynchronous invocation for an AWS Lambda function, version, or alias
